entry.tran: (广播和电视上或多个电视频道的)联播节目
entry.def: A simulcast is a programme which is broadcast at the same time on radio and television, or on more than one channel.

example.tran: 今晚威尔第创作的歌剧《阿依达》将在多个电视台联播

entry.tran: (在广播和电视上或多个电视频道)联播，同步播出
entry.def: To simulcast a programme means to broadcast it at the same time on radio and television, or on more than one channel.

example.ex: The show will be simulcast on NBC, Fox and a number of cable networks.
example.tran: 这场演出会在美国国家广播电台、福克斯广播电台和一些有线电视网上同步播出。

means.word_mean: 1. a broadcast that is carried simultaneously by radio and television (or by FM and AM radio)

auth_sentence.content: Unless we're rolling with major breaking news, we simulcast the BBC One O'Clock News.
auth_sentence.res_content: Unless we're rolling with major breaking news, we simulcast the BBC One O'Clock News.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Unless we're rolling with major breaking news, we simulcast the BBC One O'Clock News.

auth_sentence.content: The live channel streams are front and centre on the new homepage and point directly to the simulcast pages.
auth_sentence.res_content: The live channel streams are front and centre on the new homepage and point directly to the simulcast pages.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The live channel streams are front and centre on the new homepage and point directly to the simulcast pages.

auth_sentence.content: You can watch Match of the Day and Football Focus live on the website as part of a simulcast.
auth_sentence.res_content: You can watch Match of the Day and Football Focus live on the website as part of a simulcast.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You can watch Match of the Day and Football Focus live on the website as part of a simulcast.

abbreviation.mean_en: simultaneous broadcast (ing) of the same program on radio and television
abbreviation.mean_cn: 广播电视同样节目的同声播送
